Container.Name: xbackbone
Container.Overview:
Container for XBackBone, a simple and lightweight ShareX PHP backend [br][br]
-e URL [br] This will specify the app url, slashes need to be escaped like this -e URL=http://127.0.0.1
[br][br] [b]Permissions[/b] [br] [br] The folder on host system need to have both UID and GID 1000 [br][br] [b]Example[/b] [br][br] mkdir -p /mnt/user/appdata/xbb/storage [br] mkdir -p /mnt/user/appdata/xbb/database [br] mkdir -p /mnt/user/appdata/xbb/logs [br][br] chown -R 1000:1000 /mnt/user/appdata/xbb
